actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 in order to authorize two or more States to combine their use of rail service continuation subsidies.

summary.text: Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to permit States to combine their entitlements for rail service continuation subsidies in order to improve rail properties within their respective States or regions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 in order to authorize two or more States to combine their use of rail service continuation subsidies.
